intro: Eriospermum proliferum, commonly known as the many-flowered eriosperm, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its fleshy, succulent leaves and clusters of small, star-shaped yellow flowers. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often growing on rocky soils. Eriospermum proliferum is well adapted to drought conditions, making it a resilient species in its native habitat.
